summary: TAKATA RECALL: MY CAR IS CURRENTLY UNDER THE TAKATA RECALL, DRIVER AIRBAG BEING AFFECTED AND I HAVE YET TO RECEIVE ANY INFORMATION FROM THE MANUFACTURER IN REGARDS TO REPLACING THIS DEFECT. IT WAS SENT OUT IN FEBRUARY 2016 AND I NEVER RECEIVED NOTICE THAT MY CAR HAD A RECALL. I FOUND OUT FROM A FAMILY MEMBER WHOM ALSO HAS THE SAME RECALL. I WOULD LIKE TO BE MADE AWARE OF WHEN A REPLACEMENT FOR THIS DEFECT WILL BE AVAILABLE OR TO BE PROVIDED WITH BUYBACK OPTIONS ON THIS VEHICLE, AS IT IS VERY UNSAFE TO DRIVE WITH THIS DEFECT.
